overview:
Theron McCollough is President of PeoplePond.com where he oversees the new innovative social networking content verification service and other related online systems in the Cranberry Network of Web sites, including Weavemet.com.

Before his work with the Cranberry Network, McCollough co-founded and contributed to many companies who continue to redefine the Web industry, such as Techstars of Boulder, Colorado and Villij.com where, as CEO, he helped increase the scope of the Web 2.0 community.

Recognized as a social networking innovator, McCollough capably identifies areas of growth and new trends, along with sustainable and balanced solutions to relevant industry questions.

McCollough uses his unique abilities to create and facilitate goals, allowing him to do what he lovesâ€”getting things done. Dependability, creativity, concern for the individual, and his capacity to inspire sets him apart from other executives.

He is a business man, a runner, a sculptor and a student of life. McCollough’s commitment to holistic self-improvement, plus mental and physical cross-training, enhances his stand that the success and care of many will lead to the success and care for many others.

McCollough believes that the use of technology and networking is for the betterment of life on earth and considers himself a part of the team called “all-of-us.”
